scripts.init: git submodule init && git submodule update && npm install && cd dashboard && npm install && cd functions && npm install && npm run handle-config
scripts.dev: concurrently --names website,firebase "npm run next-dev" "cd dashboard && npm run emulators"
scripts.build: npm run dump-code-version && npm run handle-config && next build && next export -o build
scripts.deploy: npm run handle-config && npm run deploy-rewrites && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy-all: cd dashboard && npm run deploy-all && cd .. && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-rewrites: if ! node scripts/rewrites-deployed.js; then mkdir -p build && firebase deploy --only hosting; fi
scripts.next-dev: npm run wait-for-emulators && npm run handle-config && npm run dump-code-version && NODE_ENV='development' node scripts/server.js
